# [FEAT] Intent Detection

## Labels
`ai`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement AI-powered intent detection to understand what customers are trying to accomplish.

## Requirements

### Intent Categories
- Billing inquiries
- Technical support
- Account management
- Product information
- Complaints
- Returns/refunds
- General questions
- Custom intents

### Detection Capabilities
- Multi-intent detection
- Intent confidence scores
- Intent hierarchy
- Sub-intent identification
- Context-aware detection

### Custom Intents
- Define custom intents
- Training data upload
- Intent testing
- Intent refinement
- Intent merging

### Actions on Intent
- Auto-categorization
- Routing rules
- Suggested responses
- Workflow triggers
- Bot handoff decisions

### Intent Analytics
- Intent distribution
- Intent trends
- Resolution by intent
- Intent accuracy
- Agent agreement rates

### Model Management
- Pre-trained models
- Custom model training
- Model versioning
- A/B testing models
- Model performance tracking

## Zendesk Reference
Intelligent Triage can route tickets based on what the ticket is about (intent).

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Intent detection works
- [ ] Custom intents trainable
- [ ] Routing by intent works
- [ ] Intent analytics available
- [ ] Confidence scores accurate
